original_text: But those foolish people do not realize that her home is a place for dead people. Her visitors are already in their graves. But those foolish people do not realize that her home is a place for dead people. Her visitors are already in their graves. But those foolish people do not realize that her home is a place for dead people. Her visitors are already in their graves.
korean_text: 오직 그 어리석은 자는 죽은 자들이 거기 있는 것과 그의 객들이 스올 깊은 곳에 있는 것을 알지 못하느니라

sentences.original_text: But those foolish people do not realize
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 어리석은 사람들은 깨닫지 못합니다

sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 집이 죽은 사람들을 위한 장소라는 것을
